modName: Skyrim Metal One They Fear Replacer - Jonathan Young Version
summary: Replaces One They Fear with Jonathan Young's metal version. Just unzip or extract from the .zip and put the file in music folder in Skyrim's data folder
descriptionHtml:
Replaces One They Fear with Jonathan Young's metal version. Just unzip or extract from the .zip and put the file in music folder in Skyrim's data folder

 First, Unzip or extract the file from the .zip file
 For Steam version go to "Program Files (x86)"
 Then the Steam folder
 Next steamapps to common
 Go to Skrim then the data folder
 If you don't already have a folder titled music make one and drop this file in
 Finally, ENJOY!!
author: Theorist Aron
